GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 8f7c4114db841497e1148598e22548dd1f700b22, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 09bffa6e519256c6fa1552d6ba1f5d594337a464. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/omap: dss: Fix refcount leak bugs
